text: The 1970 European Cup Final was a football match. It was held at the San Siro, Milan, on 6 May 1970. ==Route to the final== Feyenoord Feyenoord Feyenoord Feyenoord Round Celtic Celtic Celtic Celtic Opponent Agg. 1st leg 2nd leg Opponent Agg. 1st leg 2nd leg KR Reykjavík 16–2 12–2 (A) 4–0 (H) First round Basel 2–0 0–0 (A) 2–0 (H) A.C.
